EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Reminder - Bank of England 10-28
EmailTemplate.subject: Bank of England Data Science Technical Workshop Location & Logistics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/data-science-workshops]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are receiving this email because you have been registered for the Bank of England Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop in London, on November 1st (8:30 am - 12:30 pm ).
Here are some important details that you need to know prior to attending the workshop.
Location: Pivotal London The Warehouse 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor London EC1V 9NR Map <[[https://www.google.sn/maps/place/Pivotal+Software/@51.526386,-0.0912597,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca88321b72b:0xaa6a161c1fc6539d!8m2!3d51.526386!4d-0.089071]]>
Your Pivotal instructor: Sarah Aerni <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarahaerni?authType=NAME_SEARCH&authToken=BK0c&locale=en_US&trk=tyah&trkInfo=clickedVertical%3Amynetwork%2CclickedEntityId%3A41444052%2CauthType%3ANAME_SEARCH%2Cidx%3A1-1-1%2CtarId%3A1476615075472%2Ctas%3Asarah%20aerni]]>
Prepare your system for the workshop: If you are planning to follow the workshop labs, you will need to have a client ssh program installed. There are several open source / free programs available:
- Windows: Putty <[[http://www.putty.org/]]> or MobaXterm <[[http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html]]> (MobaXterm is preferred) - MacOS: Native built in - Linux: Native built in - You are also welcome to use any commercial version you may have
Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]> for additional questions.
Kind Regards, The Pivotal Team
